primaryKeyFields.description: Ordered list of primary key field names as they appear in OpenAPI/path.

naturalIdField.description: Optional single natural identifier field (omit or null if none).

irregularPlural.description: Optional explicit singular/plural override for entities whose folder pluralization cannot be naively derived.

singular.description: Canonical singular entity name to use in variable prefixes (e.g. 'Person').

endpointSegment.description: Optional explicit REST endpoint segment if different from camelCase plural (e.g. 'people').

overrides.description: Optional explicit overrides when inference from docs would be ambiguous.

baselineLabels.description: Explicit labels to use instead of inferred first/second/... naming. Index aligned with ordinal.

suppressAssertions.description: Field paths to skip even if docs mark them required.

forceOptionalAsRequired.description: Optional fields that should always be asserted as if required.
